summary: I WAS DRIVING ALONG THE ROAD AND WAS HEARING A ABNORMAL CREEKING SOUND.  IT PERSISTED FOR A FEW DAYS AND WENT AWAY.  AFTER A FEW WEEKS THE SOUND CAME BACK, BUT THIS TIME MUCH LOUDER.  I WAS DRIVING BACK TO MY APPARTMENT AND I HEARD SOME METAL CLINKING AND THEN SAW A PIECE OF METAL BOUNCE DOWN THE ROAD BEHIND MY CAR. PART OF THE SUSPENSION COIL BROKE OFF.  THIS WAS ON A CITY STREET, DRIVING STRAIGHT DOWN THE STREET.
